data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Monseñor Nouel, Dominican Republic, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Monseñor Nouel, Dominican Republic

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Monseñor Nouel that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Monseñor Nouel, Dominican Republic not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 18,166 believers in Monseñor Nouel that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Lord, there are 139,030 people in the state of Monseñor Nouel who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Monseñor Nouel do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Monseñor Nouel, Dominican Republic the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
